1: Setting up Work Mode - > Network Import Mode 2: Export tasks from the server (as shown below) 3: Copy the downloaded etv-disonline compressed package to the U disk root directory ( etv-disonline.zip !!!No decompression!!! ) 4: Insert the U disk into the device, the device automatically decompresses the task 5: Automatically quit after operation and pull out U disk.

1: Setting up working mode - > single machine mode 2: New folder etv-media in U disk root directory 3: Copy pictures and videos to this directory 4: Insert the U disk into the device. 5: Copy complete pull out U disk complete 6: Play in alphabetical order Set animation : Layout Id PicSwitchAnim
